title: Blockchain Self-Learning Plan
description: A self-learning plan to gain a fundamental understanding of blockchain technology.

weeks.title: Introduction to Blockchain
learningObjectives: Understand the basic principles and concepts of blockchain technology
Learn about the history and evolution of blockchain
Explore the key components of a blockchain network
weeklyTasks: Read introductory articles and watch videos on blockchain technology
Understand the difference between centralized and decentralized systems
Explore the basic structure and components of a blockchain network

resources.name: Blockchain Basics: A Non-Technical Introduction in 25 Steps by Daniel Drescher
Blockchain Revolution by Don Tapscott and Alex Tapscott
Blockchain: The Insights You Need from Harvard Business Review

weeks.title: Blockchain Consensus Mechanisms
learningObjectives: Understand the different consensus mechanisms used in blockchain networks
Learn about the advantages and disadvantages of various consensus algorithms
Explore the role of consensus in maintaining the integrity of a blockchain
weeklyTasks: Analyze the working principles of different consensus mechanisms
Understand the trade-offs between security, scalability, and decentralization
Evaluate the suitability of consensus algorithms for different blockchain use cases

resources.name: Consensus Mechanisms for Blockchain Technology by Vitalik Buterin
Blockchain Consensus Mechanisms: A Primer by Binance Academy

weeks.title: Smart Contracts and Decentralized Applications
learningObjectives: Understand the concept of smart contracts and their role in blockchain
Learn how to develop and deploy simple smart contracts
Explore the potential use cases of decentralized applications (dApps)
topicsToCover: Programming languages for smart contracts (e.g., Solidity, Vyper)
Ethereum and other smart contract-enabled blockchain platforms
weeklyTasks: Familiarize yourself with a smart contract programming language
Develop and deploy a simple smart contract on a test network
Explore existing dApps and analyze their features and use cases

resources.name: Mastering Ethereum by Andreas M. Antonopoulos and Gavin Wood
Building Decentralized Applications with Ethereum and Solidity by Packt Publishing

weeks.title: Blockchain Applications and Future Trends
learningObjectives: Explore the various real-world applications of blockchain technology
Understand the challenges and limitations of blockchain adoption
Gain insights into the future developments and trends in the blockchain ecosystem
topicsToCover: Blockchain use cases in finance, supply chain, healthcare, and other industries
Scalability, privacy, and regulatory issues in blockchain
Emerging trends: decentralized finance (DeFi), non-fungible tokens (NFTs), and Web3
weeklyTasks: Research and analyze blockchain use cases in different industries
Discuss the challenges and barriers to widespread blockchain adoption
Explore the potential future developments and innovations in the blockchain space

resources.name: The Business Blockchain by William Mougayar
Blockchain: Blueprint for a New Economy by Melanie Swan
Blockchain Enabled Applications by Vikram Dhillon, David Metcalf, and Max Hooper
